text: is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-2-28. in Kawasaki, which is south of Tokyo in Kanagawa Prefecture.Soccerway.com, "Kawasaki Frontale"; retrieved 2012-3-2. In 2012, Yahiro Kazama was named coach.Soccerway.com, Y.Kazama; retrieved 2012-6-26. ==History== The club was founded in 1955. *1955-1995 Fujitsu SC *1996 Fujitsu Kawasaki SC *1997-present Kawasaki Frontale ==League title== *Japan Soccer League Division 2 : 1 **1976 *J1 League : 4 **2017, 2018, 2020, 2021 *J2 League : 2 **1999, 2004 ==League position== *2011 : J1 League - 11th *2012 : J1 League - 8th *2013 : J1 League - 3rd *2014 : J1 League - 6th *2015 : J1 League - 6th *2016 : J1 League - 3rd *2017 : J1 League - Champions *2018 : J1 League - Champions *2019 : J1 League - 4th *2020 : J1 League - Champions *2021 : J1 League - Champions ===Former position=== == Notable achievement == The team has some notable achievements. In 2010, Juninho (Carlos Alberto Carvalho dos Anjos Junior) made three goals in one game against Shonan Bellmare; and Jumpei Kusukami scored three times in a game against Gamba Osaka.WorldFootball.net, "3 Goals in one game"; retrieved 2012-7-5.
